message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product. I think it's a great fit for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I think the product is worth more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that. How about we try $95?
I'm willing to compromise further, Bob. How about we try $102?
I'm still a bit above that, but I'm getting closer. How about we try $98?
I'm getting close, Bob! How about we try $101?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll give you one last chance. How about we try $99?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we're very close. How about we meet at $100?
I've already found a better deal with John for $100, so I'm out of here. Thanks for the negotiation, but I'll be taking my business elsewhere.
